nodes.text: 1977 Topps Star Wars Series 2 was a trading card set released by Topps in 1977.

The set was based on Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope, and featured stills from the film, promotional photos and behind the scenes photos, all within a red border. Backs of the cards featured "Actor's Profile" or "Movie Facts" themes, or included a portion of a larger image that could be pieced together with other cards like a puzzle.  A sub-set of sticker cards was included.
Card numbering in the set continued from the previous series.

Some cards use images from deleted scenes from the film: Card 74 uses an image from the scene featuring Luke Skywalker and Biggs Darklighter on Tatooine, Card 85 is from the deleted scene of Luke repairing a moisture vaporator, Card 101 shows Chewbacca from the deleted, later restored, scene of Jabba the Hutt in Docking Bay 94, and Card 132 uses an image from a deleted scene featuring Darth Vader and Moradmin Bast.
Like in the previous card series, lightsabers are referred to as "light sabres."
